title: ninna maganu
sahitya:
ninna maganu muddu ninagAdare gOpi yArigEne amma enna kUDe tA sarasavADutAne sAru nInE


caraNam 1    heccina satiyara kacceya biccuva huccanEnE amma icceriyatu namma gallava kaccuva nallanEnE
    caraNam 2    ceNDendu hengaLa kucagaLa piDivare gaNDanEnE amma kaNDalli uddaNDa tanava mADutAne puNDanEnE
    caraNam 3    hosa kUDavaridu hAsikeyanu hAkuva shishuvu Ene amma asahAya shUra purandara viTTalarAya kANe
